BasicInfo.short: AppSense provides user virtualization, mobile management, and desktop management technology solutions to enterprise organizations.

Products.name: DesktopNow
Products.description: Simplify the management of any Windows desktop, physical or virtual, while increasing IT control and user productivity.

Products.name: MobileNow
Products.description: AppSense MobileNow is the only 100% SaaS delivered solution that solves the complete bring-your-own-device, apps and data (BYOX).

Products.name: DataNow
Products.description: DataNow enables simple, secure access, sync and sharing of your enterprise files, no matter where they live.
